workflow.name: 90-SAPHanaSR-ScaleOut
workflow.longdesc:
The SAPHanaSR-ScaleOut HAWK wizard is capable to configure all needed resources, master slave and clone definitions as well as constraints.
As SAPHanaSR-ScaleOut configurations are intended to be very standardized the wizard asks only three needed parameters: SID, InstanceNumber and ip address.
